level.heading: Equitable relief.
level.text: The Superior Court of the District of Columbia may issue an injunction or grant other equitable relief appropriate to ensure substantial compliance with or to enforce this subchapter on application by:
A covered voter alleging a grievance under this subchapter; or
An election official in the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 18 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
